## Potential Rules for CAFs and Col4a5: **Rule 1:** In cancer-associated fibroblasts, Col4a5 increases collagen synthesis. **Justification:** Col4a5 is a component of collagen type IV, a major component of the basement membrane. CAFs are known to play a crucial role in extracellular matrix (ECM) remodeling, including collagen synthesis. CAFs are known to be highly motile and contribute to tumor invasion.
